73106919.review:
Waframe-одна из самых лучших ммо-рпг в которые мне доводилось играть(разве что Path Of Exile для меня будет лучше),но даже у такой игры есть свои недостатки.Начнём с плюсов.
1)Комьюнити. В этой игре одно из самых адекватных комьюнити которое я вообще встречал.Особенно это видно когда набираешь людей в свой клан(открытый для всех клан,а не в ёбаный вакум для 15 рангов и возрастом 18+).Люди вежливые,адекватные и готовы тебе помочь,но бывают редкие исключения.(Предупреждение:не заходите в региональный чат.Там иногда происходит полная вакханалия)
2)Геймплей,а если быть точнее его разнообразие.В Warfame дофигища планет,локаций,множество видов вооружения и самих варфреймов.Также за последние года 2 добавили пару открытых локаций,а именно Равнины Эйдолона(Земля) и Долина Сфер(Венера).Сами по себе они не очень большие,но заняться там есть чем(да и идти всёравно придётся).Также добавили возможность сделать свой боевой корабль(Рейлджек),и лететь крошить корабли врагов,но с этим вы сами разберётесь)
3)Графон.По первости ты будешь ахуевать от этого графона,ведь он очень красивый даже на минималках(на коих я проиграл 800 часов из-за слабого пк).
4)Оптимизация.Не каждая игра может похвастаться этим сегодня,особенно с такой графикой.Чтобы вы понимали как тут всё хорошо,то я спокойно играл с процессором Intel Core 2 на 2,4 МГц и 4 гигами оперативки DDR3(ведро 16 летней давности).Совру если скажу что не лагало совсем,на открытых локациях я особо не играл(Равнины и Долина),но не будь  такой оптимизации мой комп бы сгорел нахуй,как в BlackDesert.
5)ЗДЕСЬ МОЖНО ВЫТОРГОВАТЬ ДОНАТ ВАЛЮТУ!!!!В игре множество вещей можно продавать за донат валюту,например моды и прайм части оружия,фреймов и прочее.Если вы не ленивый овощ и у вас есть базовые навыки торговли и терпение,то с голой жопой на обочене вы не останетесь)(Предупреждение:В магазине полно оружия за донат,но всё(или большинство) это доступно за бесплатно в виде клановых чертежей(чертежи в лабораториях клана))
6)Кастомизация.В Warframe себя конечно сделать не получиться,но за то ты можешь украшать свою экипировку,питомцев,корабль,клан(у клана есть отдельное здание с отдельными в нём постройками),менять у всего и вся цвет(даже у украшений по типу наколенников и плаща),но большинство таких плюшек стоит либо денег либо платины(которую можно фармить).
7)Кланы.В игре они представлены не как ёбаные бафолки из корейских ммо-рпг,а как полноценная структура,со своими постройками и комнатами.Это великолепие именуется как додзё.В додзё и находятся все лаборатории.Также там можно торговать и там будет расположен ваш рейлджек.(Предупреждение для основателей кланов:Если вы хотите вкачать свой клан для увеличения максимального количества игроков в клане то проверьте всё ли вы нужное исследовали,потому что когда клан переходит на новую ступень то все исследования,за редким исключением,дорожают и дорожают очень сильно(Раза в 3,потом в 10 и так далее)
8)Сюжетные квесты.Скажем так,их проходить интересно,некоторые даже запоминаются.В квестах повествуется сюжет,но с этим вы уж сами разъберётесь.
Поговорим о минусах.У меня их 2
1)Фарм.Игра тебе тоненько намекает,что ты можешь тупо прийти в эту игру отдохнуть,но ты пофарми.ОЧЕНЬ МНОГО ПОФАРМИ.Некоторые ресурсы падают в таком малом количестве,что ты будешь их фармить по очень долго(особенно если ты создатель клана),например образцы мутагена,которые падают по 15 штук за 20 минут в соло.Мне их нужно 15k(((
2)Система выпадения вещей аля казино Вулкан,где хер тебе выпадет,а не нужная вещь с 1,2 или дай бог с 3 попытки.РАЗОЙДУТСЯ МОРЯ,СОЙДУТСЯ МАТЕРИКИ,РАСТАЮТ ПОЛЯРНЫЕ ЛЬДЫ,БОГ НА ЗЕМЛЮ СПУСТИТСЯ,НО ТЫ НЕ ВЫБЬЕШЬ ПРОСТО ТАК НУЖНУЮ ВЕЩЬ.Спасает то что прайм вещи можно купить,но вот части обычных варфреймов ты купить не сможешь,так что фарми.Тебе выпадет 20 систем протеи,30 нейрооптик и НИОДНОГО КАРКАСА.
Вывод:Если вы любите фармить,открывать новые пушки,снаряжение,локации и прочее,если вы ищете ммо для кампании или даже для клана,то это то что вам нужно.Только мой совет.Вам понадобятся в некоторых моментах ТИТАНОВЫЕ НЕРВЫ чтобы идти вперёд,особенно если вы глава клана(коим и я являюсь),так что пройдите Sekiro или 1 часть Dark Souls(2 попроще будет),чтобы нервишки закалить свои и выработать терпение.Если же вы слабая проклятая душа,кухарка,казуал которому нужно всё готовое на блюдечке,то идите мимо,игра не для вас(игра лёгкая,но изнуряющая)
(Если вы дочитали до этого момента,то огромное вам спасибо.Не зря я это сочинение час писал:)).Последний совет для самых стойких и терпеливых:Когда вы начнёте играть,то вам дадут 50 платины.Её нельзя использовать при торговле,но можно потратить на реакторы,слоты,или на худой конец на скины.НЕ ТРАТЬТЕ ПЛАТИНУ НА ФОРМЫ!!!ИХ МОЖНО ЛЕГКО ВЫБИТЬ!!!)Спасибо вам за внимание!Да благовалят боги вашим фармическим приключениям!До свидания)
(P.S.Я не верующий)

72685502.review: Warframe was one of my favourite games, the play to win and not pay to win system made it so much better for everyone. But as the years went by and with less to do after finishing every achievement, quest and grinded all frames and weapons and finished that last MR test, there was nothing left that would keep me in the game more than logging on only to help and guide others. The newer updates are dreadful in my eyes and I feel like the game has lost its touch, so the Warframe I knew and enjoyed I will be forever thankful for and the friends I made during this time, playing and having fun together. But I will never go back fully to it.  I will still give a thumbs up for the old content, it's a game worth trying even though it's a bit hard in the beginning before you figure out how it works.

72481879.review:
En premier lieu il faut expliquer ce qu'est Warframe.
Warframe est un jeu où l'ont va jouer une warframe, sorte d'armure ayant des capacités lié à un élément tel que le feu, la glace ou ayant des thèmes bien précis.
Vous parcourez des niveaux jouable jusqu'à 4 joueurs en coopération puis vous récupérez des ressource qui vous permettrons par la suite de créer de nouvelles warframes ou de nouvelles armes plus puissante afin d'affronter des ennemis de plus en plus fort. Jusque là, nous somme devant un jeu de loot simple, mais ce qui fait le charme de ce jeu est tous ce qu'il y a derrière, l'optimisation de build qui se fait à travers des mods qui vont permettre d'augmenter en puissance ou même dans certain cas changer une compétence, les quêtes (pas toutes intéressante), les clans, les différents modes de jeux (chacun y trouvera se compte), le gameplay très nerveux, le ressentis de puissance lorsque l'on dégomme des ennemis par dizaine, une communauté très sympathique dans l'ensemble basé sur l'entraide, bref, je pense que vous avez bien compris que j'ai énormément aimé ce jeu et je ne pourrais pas faire une liste de tous le contenu proposé, ça serait trop long.  
Si vous aimez looter, montrer vos talent d'artiste sur la personnalisation, être surpuissant, passer un bon moment avec vos potes, foncez !

73548459.review:
Итак, по прошествии как вы можете видеть довольно дофига часов я могу честно сказать, что игру я не советую, и вот почему.
Причин, в общем-то, три. Плюс одна, с нее и начну.

Нулевая. 
Начну я с нее просто потому, что для меня лично она основная, и потому что многие решат что дело в подгорании(правильно сделают, но в общем-то представление иметь стоит) - параноидальный автобан, и отсутствие техподдержки.
То есть, следите за руками, вы можете быть забанены если у вас активна программа, сканирующая память. Все.
Никаких других мотиваций не требуется, никаких оправданий вам дать не дадут, ибо техподдержка не имеет прав ни на что, кроме как писать "сам виноват, ты соглашался с еула" и закрывать тикет.
Так что все дебаггеры, артмани, я-не-знаю-что-там-еще закрывайте, а лучше удаляйте с машины при запуске варфрейма - иначе у автобана в непредсказуемый момент и без предупреждения случится приступ колики и он влепит бан.

Что особенно забавно, так это то, что авторы автобана почему-то считают, что в онлайн-игре с контролем лута и без соревновательной части есть какой-то сакральный смысл копаться в памяти(я в любом случае максимум на что мог бы повлиять - так это на урон, который более чем бесполезен)

Первая.
Сюжет. Дело, конечно, хоть немного начало выправляться со временем, но немного лишь. Сюжет можно изложить на двух страницах а4 не особо мелким шрифтом. Игре уже лет семь, а воз и ныне там. На обещания разработчиков про "вот-вот" можно даже не вестись - единственное, что выйдет по плану, так это очередной прайм-доступ, ибо он приносит ПРИБЫЛЬ.
Все остальное - ну как-нибудь, когда-нибудь. Может быть.

Вторая.
В общем-то вытекает из первой. Скорость доработок и вообще схема игры.
Тут стоит понимать один нюанс - игра хитрит, и экономит на серверах - сессии запускаются на машинах игроков. но контролируются с сервера. То бишь сервер следит за тем, чтобы ты не мухлевал, но обсчитывать боевку будет машина хоста. Это было понятным маневром во время открытия вф, ибо сервера стоят денег, но сейчас это выглядит как бессильный и беззубый костыль, оставшийся от нежелания вкладываться в развитие. 
И это приводит нас к тому, что играя в вф ты должен привыкнуть к:
Багам. Багов будет ОЧЕНЬ много и ты их будешь ловить - необходимый минимум любого игрока в вф это баг геодаты, когда ты оказываешься под текстурами и это до конца сессии. На миссиях скорее забавно, на больших локациях - добро пожаловать в перезаход.
Просто косякам дизайна и неочевидным механикам, которые раскрываются парой строчек на форумах. Положим, я этого не замечал, но знакомые, пытавшиеся разобраться в игре быстро приходили к выводу что они или смотрят гайды или начинают превозмогать. Для примера - сейчас для всех очевидно, что из разлома лимбо можно выйти кувырком, но что было на выходе - не описать словами, а новички встревают и по сей день.
Лагам. ОООО ДА ДЕТКА  - ты можешь минуту ждать пока дверь соизволит открыться, если хост играет с картошки или по хреновому каналу - а уж если случается смена хоста... ну, сейчас бывает что она проходит без проблем, но бывает лишь.

И последний, но не по значению, это момент с однообразием. Оно... велико. Велико настолько, что 200+ траев босса в ВоВ вам сказкой покажутся. И дело даже не в фарме(есть те, кому нравится фарм, в конце концов), а в том, что в общем-то никакой угрозы бравые мобцы не несут и лезут строго взвешенными партиями, чтобы играющий даже уснув на клавише стрельбы мог продолжать их нарезать. То есть игрок будет бегать по одним и тем же декорациям стараясь бежать максимально быстро(и если попадет в пати хай-лвл то для него на этом в общем-то участие и закончится - мобов будут аннигилировать в радиусе светового года без него), лениво водить мышкой из стороны в сторону, дабы прибить поналезших и... все. Укрытия, перекаты, щиты? Зачем? Ты бессмертен и неуязвим. Уровней так до 200 приблизительно. Точное прицеливание? Зачем? Даже если забыть о критических зонах с пол-моба ты все равно их убиваешь попаданием в пятку - можно не париться вообще. Разница между оружием сводится к способу закликивания болванчиков.

В итоге, лично я рекомендую что-нибудь более соревновательное, для тех кто любит пвп(в этой игре оно по сути отсутствует) и что-нибудь более сюжетное для любителей синглплеера.
И да. это говорит чувак с около 1.4к часов.

73253824.review:
At the point of time of writing this review, DE has yet to be bought and I have had 4683 hours of play time on steam, if you asked young me would i recommend this game, sure. But the future of this game is rather dim in my eyes.

Warframe is certainly a very good game for a F2P game, it has graphics compatible to a paid one, variety is the calling card of this game, with highly varied choices of frames for you to play as, each equipped with a different arsenal of badassery, with weapons of equally matched variety when it comes to types and builds. Warframe is by no means low quality, and is highly competitive when it comes to looter games.

But recently, the quality in updates has plummeted drastically. From Kuva Liches, a first thought-to-be game changing system introducing  a new type of relationship built between the players and a powerful enemy, to the very simple difficulty increasing Steel Path, its clear that these updates have become more and more effortless and that their sole purpose is for marketing. Many of the updates they've pushed out have ceased to live up to community expectations drawn from what they managed to change and revolutionize in previous updates, and showing the fact that DE as game developers, knows very little about what the player desires and what the game needs.

I hope that the quality of future updates and changes will prove this review to be irrational hate and overly harsh skepticism, but for now this game is declining in quality and I could not recommend someone else spending 4k hours like I do.

73666948.review:
[h1] Honest Review [/h1]

I have some free time so here we gooooooooo
Compared to other MMO, Warframe is like a meaningless grind once you realized. Games usually rewards with higher end weapons, skills, features for harder dungeons with *NEW* bosses the more time you spend in it (Literally other MMO) but Warframe is like a different kind of MMO that actually doesn't do that.

Yes I only have 955 hours on Steam but I'm close to 2k off Steam so I've played enough to express myself inb4 some delusional players that still stands for it because they've spent too much money that they couldn't leave the game anymore.

Some information for players who want to try out Warframe,I'd breakdown my playtime to explain how it's like.
I've quit Warframe several times, or way too many times because there's basically nothing to do. Upon each time I return, I spent almost 90% of playtime leveling and maximizing gears with only less than 10% of trying the NEW update.

80% of the total playtime is being afk levelling up gears or farming resources. Only 20% of playtime is actual story quests, cinematic, brand new first-experience of new missions and enjoying new contents. You do the math.

In short, I spend roughly 20 hours per patch playing the actual game before quitting, skipping the meaningless hours trying new weapons.

While you say the combat is fun where there's hack n slash mixed with magic/sci-fi elements that you can pair with your own customization to literally however you want to play it, it is fun in that feature. You get to go weird least popular builds for runs and try new experience, there's definitely that enjoyable part I've been through. But after trying all possible builds with countless Forma (prestige of character with just very low skill capacity increase), you've realized you wasted over 10 hours on a set of Frame, primary and melee that ended up being stashed in your inventory the day after. This is basically Warframe, welcome to Warframe. There's actually nothing else to do apart from this. I am not kidding, I am really not kidding about that.

There's no reason to progress any further once you reach several optimal weapons and builds ! [b] You'll still be standing at the same place as someone who pays for rivens and unlock weapons/gears/frames instantly regardless spending over 9000 hours! **OR EVEN SOMEONE WHO ONLY HAVE 50 HOURS**  [/b]

Even if you return after 4 years of inactivity, you're literally still on par as players that plays 24/7 so. There will really be this one day where you sit down and launch this game, thinking is it really worth it sitting here looking at the Trading Channel to sell some parts and repeat what I'm doing? Am I really playing the game? What if all these hours were spent on some other MMOs? Perhaps I will already be a clan lord or respected healer/tanker that people invites to every dungeon runs regularly.

The most hilarious update by far is the Steel Path, literally known as "Start All Over for the little bit of Mastery XP" while the Extra 24901749% drop chance seems almost as diminishing return with the difficulty scaling up. You thought there's new assets, new models, actual new mechanics? Hahahaha, enjoy Archwing and Railjack then.
More updates, more endless grinds without actually any profiting returns!

It is not OPEN WORLD, it is a LARGE-SCALED MISSION MAP with NPC for quick mission repeats!

Love or hate, what I said is what's facts about this game.

[spoiler] Something nobody mentions at all, but I'll do. What you see in trailers of this game is NOT how this game is played. ALL players (100% of players literally) bullet jump and roll with some speed boost through the entire mission, skipping all enemies straight to the objective, or AFK at a spot for some leech EXP, preferably I'd say the ENTIRE game so make sure not to use the shift button or actually tries to have fun playing like what's in trailer so you'll not get leavers all the time thinking you're some kind of joke. [/spoiler]

[spoiler] Also, the game often breaks on every updates that needs you to redownload 60GB once a new major update releases. Have fun! [/spoiler]

I think it's time for me to write about this game! What got me furious was over the disk space and how I kept hearing that this game was "space ninjas with guns" on Discord. There would be things such as Nightwave, mining, fishing etc. I found it a little too much for the new players and maybe they should lock certain sections by Mastery Rank. Overall, this game is pure grinding and this is one of many reasons why I like it because everything feels earnt instead of being furious for people buying for better equipment. 73878191.review:
[quote] [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36579661-Setna/]Başlamadan önce diğer incelemelerimin olduğu küratör sayfamı takip edin.[/url] [/quote]

Neredeyse ilk çıktığı dönemden beri ara ara oynadığım Warframe hakkında sonunda inceleme yazıyorum.

Öncelikle Digital Extremes ekibini tebrik ediyorum. Bunca yıl boyunca sürekli olarak yeni içerikler getirerek oyunu ciddi anlamda genişlettiler. Kısaca bu genişlemeyi şöyle anlatayım sizlere. Oyunun ilk çıktığı dönemlerde gemidir, yok açık dünyada gezmektir filan hiçbir şey yoktu. Oyuna giriyordunuz ve Tenno'nuzun (oyundaki adınız) önünde 3-5 farklı gezegen ve bu gezegenlerin içinde 3-5 farklı tek başınıza ya da 4 kişiye kadar takımca girebileceğiniz görevler bulunmaktaydı. Sonrasında güncellemeler ile basit bir uzay gemisi eklendi ve oyuna girdiğinizde serbestçe bu 40-50 metrekarelik gemide gezebilmeye başladınız, tabi bu sırada bir çok yeni gezegen ve görev de eklendi oyuna. Daha sonrasında bu geminin içeriğini genişlettiler ve adeta dublex bir villaya dönüştürdüler. İçerisinde silahlarınızdan tutun warframelerinize (oyundaki bir "zırh" )kadar çeşitli makineler ve araştırma laboratuvarları bulunmaktaydı. Öyle ki uzay geminiz mini bir karargah gibi oldu. Daha sonrasında açık dünya gezegenleri ve hatta ve hatta uzay gemisi kapışmaları eklendi. Bunu derken basit uzay gemisi çatışmalarından bahsetmiyorum. Birkaç kişilik grupla uzay geminizi kontrol ettiğiniz gerektiğinde çatışma sırasında özel ekipmanlarınızla uzay gemisinin dışına çıkıp karşı gemileri bordaladığınız savaşlarda bahsediyorum. Bunların üstüne kendi takımınız kazanmakta zorluk çekerse bir de yardım sinyali oluşturarak yakın gezegenlerdeki Tenno'lardan yardım isteyebiliyorsunuz. Onlar da kabul ederse basit bir görevin ardından gezegenden size destek verebiliyorlar. Bu basit co-op görev yapma oyununun dünyası o kadar genişledi ki bundan sonrası artık oyunun devasa bir harita ile tamamen açık dünya bir MMORPG oyununa dönüşmesi. Valla ne yalan söyleyeyim fena fikir değil :D Neyse yazdıkça yazdım. Uzun lafın kısası Warframe kendini sürekli ilginç&ilgi çekici şekilde geliştiren bir oyun. Kendini bu denli geliştiren başka herhangi bir oyun yok. 

Hikayemiz kısaca şöyle. Tenno'lar Warframe zırhlarını kullanabilen üstün savaşçılar. Bu savaşçıların nasıl bu hale geldiğini anlatan wiki sayfaları var okumanızı tavsiye ederim, ilgi çekici gerçekten de. Bu savaşçılar "eski savaş" sonrasında derin uykuya yatırılıyorlar. Günümüzde ise Grineer kuvvetleri yükseliştedir. Grineer'lar eski savaş sonrasında yükselişe geçmiş "köleler" dersek yanılmış olmayız sanırım, detayları için yine wiki sayfalarına uğramanızı tavsiye ederim. Grineer'lar Tenno'ların uyanırlarsa kendilerini yok edebilecek güçte olduklarını bildiklerinden onları derin uykuda iken öldürmeye çalışırlar. Fakat bir süre sonra Tenno'ları öldürmek yerine onları ele geçirip kontrol altına alırlarsa durduralamaz bir güç olacaklarını düşünürler. Tabii ki bu durum beklendiği gibi olmaz ve Tenno'lar onların ellerinden kurtulur. Biz de onlardan biri olarak oyuna başlarız...

Grafikleri gerçekten muazzam. Oynaması ücretsiz oyunlar arasında Call of Duty Warzone'dan sonra en kaliteli grafiklere sahip oyun kesinlikle Warframe. Özellikle patlamalar ve alev efektleri gerçekten göze çok hoş geliyor. Üstüne üstelik oyunun optimizasyonu da gayet iyi durumda olduğundan çok karışık durumlarda bile kare hızınız asgari düzeyde etkileniyor.

Oyunun mekaniklerine gelirsek. Açıkçası o kadar farklı şeyler var ki anlatmakla bitmez. Duvardan duvara koşmak olsun, düz duvara tırmanma olsun, çeşit çeşit zıplama kayma mekanikleri olsun, araçlar olsun hani anlatmaya zaman yetmez. Öğrenmesi çok zor olmasa da ustalaşması bir hayli vakit alıyor. Oyunun oynanışı yeterince derin olduğu gibi RPG öğeleri de çok derin. Her türlü silaha çeşit çeşit eklentiler ekleyip çeşit çeşit kombinasyonlar yapabiliyorsunuz. Yapabileceğiniz ama daha da önemlisi etkin olarak kullanabileceğiniz onlarca ekipman düzeni var.

Hazır silahlardan bahsetmişken. Oyun içerisinde P2W var mı? Aslına bakarsanız az çok var. Oyuna para yatırırsanız tabii ki hızla ileriye doğru gidebiliyorsunuz fakat üzülmeyin çünkü oyun içerisindeki her şeyi para vermeden edinebiliyorsunuz. Eh zaman alıyor ama olsun. Bunlara ekstra olarak oyuna para yatırmak öyle çok pahalı da değil. Zaten oyun içerisinde sık sık %75 indirim kuponu falan bol bol düşüyor. Bu indirim kuponlarıyla da bir hayli uygun fiyata çok iyi şeyler elde edebiliyorsunuz.

Genel olarak, ben saatlerimi gömeceğim ücretsiz bir RPG oyunu arıyorum diyorsanız mutlaka denemelisiniz. 75SP

73154444.review:
[h1] LA GUERRE DES CHÂSSIS ? [/h1]

Ne vous laissez pas avoir par ses débuts "direct dans le grand bain" et son côté "droit à l'essentiel" des premières heures.
Warframe est un jeu d'une richesse incroyable, débordant de contenu, qui s'étoffe au fil des heures, offrant alors un titre au croisement de nombreux autres, pour un résultat tout à fait unique.
[b] Commençons classique : côté réalisation et bande sonore, le titre frappe plutôt fort, surtout si on le compare à d'autres free to play. Le scénario, qui parait au début n'être qu'un prétexte à se lancer dans des missions variées mais répétitives, dans des niveaux générés aléatoirement, se montre petit à petit assez ambitieux. Avec un souci de la mise en scène, des twists et une montée en puissance sur les enjeux. Du tout bon. [/b]
Si le jeu n'est pas très complexe, il n'en reste pas moins vrai qu'il est assez avare en explications et que de nombreuses exceptions ou subtilités au sein de chaque features viennent alourdir la facilité de compréhension du nouveau joueur. Warframe est un jeu qui s'apprécie pleinement entre amis, qui se lancent dans l'aventure à peu près en même temps et partagent leurs découvertes. Ou bien il faut rejoindre un clan et se trouver un mentor, quelqu'un qui connaît bien le jeu et pourra vous expliquer toutes ses subtilités. Comment faire de l'endo ? Comment bien modder ? Où trouver telle ou telle ressources ? Quelles stats faut-il essayer d'avoir sur ce le riven de cette arme ? Comment jouer au mieux cette frame ? Quels secrets renferment certains niveaux ? Dans tous les cas, il ne faut pas avoir peur de poser des questions, d'échanger avec d'autres joueurs et bien sûr de se rendre régulièrement sur le wiki du jeu (et de préférence anglais car plus détaillé et plus à jour).
Si vous vous impliquez dans votre expérience de jeu, Warframe dévoilera de nombreux visages au fil de votre aventure. De free to play avec génération procédurale, vous irez lorgner vers le hack'n slash, le MMO, le rpg, le triple A, Star Wars (vous n'êtes absolument pas prêts pour les sorties dans l'espace avec votre propre vaisseau quand vous démarrez l'aventure)
Avec plusieurs centaines de mods à récupérer plus ou moins facilement, des centaines d'armes, des dizaines et des dizaines de warframes, rien qu'avoir à peu près tout monter vous prendra facilement des milliers d'heures.
Car il faut bien le dire, Warframe est un jeu long, qui s'étale dans votre vie et dévore votre temps avec un appétit insatiable. Il y a toujours quelque chose à faire : progresser dans sa carte stellaire, débloquer de nouvelles frames, collecter des ressources pour crafter de nouveaux objets, faire les défis des ondes nocturnes pour gagner ses récompenses très intéressantes, monter et formater ses armes pour les rendre plus puissantes, monter ses écoles de focus, chasser l'eidolon, se confronter à la route de l'acier et farmer les essences de fer, tenir plus d'une heure en arbitrage. Vous fixez vos propres objectifs.
Sans cesse mis à jour, sans cesse enrichi, toujours plus ambitieux, Warframe fait parti de ces rares jeux qui s'apprécient tout autant, que l'on y joue de temps en temps depuis des années ou que l'on enchaîne les heures dessus chaque jour  de manière frénétique.

On pourrait écrire un livre sur ce jeu tellement il y a de choses à en dire, mais je n'ai pas envie de faire peur à d'éventuels joueurs. Sachez simplement que vos débuts ne sont rien, vous aurez bientôt tant d'autres choses à faire que vous n'aurez pas assez d'une journée pour tout faire chaque jour. [b] Donnez sa chance au jeu, cherchez à percer ses mystères et vous passerez des centaines voir des milliers d'heures d'amusement dessus. En échange, et si vous ne savez pas vous arrêter, il prendra votre vie ! [/b]

72837151.review:
Игра, лучшая из лучших, полно контента полно игровых механик, и самое важное игра продолжает развиваться и не стоит на месте, очень красочная графика, приятные локации, игра полна контента, и большой выбор планет, и каждая со своей особенностью, огромное разнообразие оружия и варфреймов, высокий уровень кастомизации, игра не на один вечер, даже не на месяца, в этой игре можно развиваться и прокачиваться бесконечно, и с каждым уровнем будет открываться все больше и больше возможностей, так же есть возможность крафта, как брони, оружия, так и самих  варфреймов и скинов, а самое главное что это не просто смена внешнего вида, а и смена геимплея, так как каждый варфрейм уникален и имеет свой стиль игры и набор способностей.
Из минусов я могу заметить только то что в игре очень дорогой донат, много классных штук ( таже покраска персонажа) скрыта за покупкой цветов за 150 рублей,  очень дорогие DLC, большинство миссий пришлось смотреть прохождение на ютубе так как не всегда понятно чего хочет от тебя игра, так же присутствует однообразие, на каждой из планет идентичные активности будь то, или захват или оборона или выживание и тд... 
Но игра сама по себе отличная, если в ней разобраться то все будет идти быстро, так же порадовало наличие сюжета, довольно таки не плохого
Вердикт: 10 Тэнно из 10
P.s.  Хотел написать краткий обзор, но увы, не сложилось :)
Жизнь боль...

72689075.review:
2013 yapımı bu oyunu ilk 2014 yılında oynamaya fırsatı buldum. O yıllarda kendi türü arasında açık ara en iyi f2p oyunlarından birisiydi fakat oyunda o zamanlar daha open world türünde her hangi bir şey bulunmuyordu. Prime olan warframeler sınırlıydı , silahlar azdı. 2014 yılından bu zamana kadar bir çok içerik getirerek ve her yeni gelen patchde oyunu zenginleştiren yapımcılara teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum. Eğer grind , farm ve uzun soluklu oyun arayışındaysanız Warframe size göre bir oyun. Oyunda %100 türkçe dil desteği bulunmakta. Başta karışık bir oyun gibi gözükse de youtube'da Serdar SARI gibi Warframe rehberi çekenlerden oyunu rahatça ve kolayca kavrayabilirsiniz. Oyunun hikayeside gayet güzel fakat hemen heyecanlanmayın. Çünkü bir kaç sinematikli questlerden başka kayda değer bir şey yok.

- Oyunun Artı Yönleri

- Bu tür oyunlardan hoşlanıyorsanız oyunun ilk 500 saatinden zevk alarak oynayacağınızdan kuşkunuz dahil olmasın. Fakat oyuna bir süre sonra neredeyse her şeye eriştikten sonra ancak gerçekten seviyorsanız devam edebilirsiniz ötesi biraz zor.
- Silahların ön planda olduğu bu oyunda 100'den fazla değişik silahın her dizaynı , yakın dövüş silahlarının her vurduğunuzda o vuruş hissiyatını size yaşatması muazzam bir duygu!
- Oyunda Warframe'e ve silahlarınıza mod takarak kendinizi geliştiriyorsunuz. 300'den fazla mevcut olan modlarla birlikte istediğiniz buildi istediğiniz şekilde kendiniz yapabilirsiniz. Yani size oynarken zevk aldıracak buildleri kendi çapınızda yaratabilirsiniz.
- Oyunun karakter dizayn ekranı muazzam. Dilediğiniz Warframe'i istediğiniz şekilde , istediğiniz renkte , istediğiniz aksesuarla dilediğiniz kadar değiştirebilirsiniz. 
- Digital Express bu oyunda herkese eli açık , cömert davranıyor. Oyunda f2p olmasına rağmen oyunda p2w bulunmamakta. 

- Oyunun Eksi Yönleri

- Oyunun hikayesi çok güzel , senaryo çok güzel fakat istedikleri şekilde bize verdiklerini düşünmüyorum. Oyunda 3-4 görevin sinematikleri muazzam derecede güzel olsada 100 görev içerisinden diğerlerinin iyi olduğunu pekte söyleyemem.
- Artı yönlerinde de belirttiğim gibi oyun bir süresini size çok güzel gelsede bir noktadan sonra doygunluk vericeğine şüpheniz olmasın. Sürekli bir oyun ama endgame olduktan sonra oynama hevesiniz kaçabilir.
- PvE sistemi her ne kadar muazzam olsada , PvP sistemi için aynı şeyleri söyleyemem. PvE odaklı bu oyunun her ne kadar kendi içinde PvP modları olsada Warframe PvP alanında sınıfta kalmış bir oyun.

72909762.review:
Игра со временем может надоесть из-за гринда, крафты занимают много времени
Много чего можно сказать об этой игре. Больше плюсов, чем минусов. В кратце здесь вы найдете просто огромное количества интересного по своей механике оружия и персонажей с уникальными способностями и фишками. Планеты, на каждой из которых много миссий и режимов, а также боссов.
Причем все это в доступности для любых игроков и новичков в том числе. Игра затянет довольно-таки надолго, но хотелось бы отметить, что она будет со временм надоедать из-за постоянного фарма и гринда, учитывая, что в игре нет сложности и высокоуровневым игрокам становится скучно из-за простоты мобов. Каждое оружие вы можете собрать под себя и эксперементировать что из этого вышло, например сделать выстрелы огненными или токсичными, различные улучшения характеристик на любой вкус благодаря карточкам, которые игрок получает и прокачивает, в этом всем интересно разбираться. Сюжет как по мне немного запутанный, но тоже интересный если разобраться. В игре большое количество разнообразных противников, отличающиеся особой механикой боя. Так же есть питомцы, большое количество скинов и безграничная кастомизация оружия, персонажей, питомцев и даже своего личного корабля, который также можно обустроить на свой вкус. Хочу еще обратить внимание на то, что в игру совсем не обязательно вкладывать реальные деньги, а просто можно торговать с другими игроками, продавая нафармленное за донат-валюту (платину). Красивые механики боя и куча видов оружия ближнего боя, почувствуйте себя как"ниндзя" или "свирепый воин" с огромным мечом. В общем игра интересная и здесь есть чем заняться. Советую.

73559648.review:
玩了这么多的游戏，warframe是唯一让我想说两句的，首先不推荐玩。
1.游戏存在了这么多年，游戏性上没有一点创新，去年重推的railjack根本做出没有宣传的样子，不断更新的只有皮肤和没用的枪与Prime战甲，主线推进几乎为零。nightwave是原本我比较期待的一个玩法，但是实际上差强人意，重复的系统与没有实际更新的敌人让人难以持续的刷声望。
2.DE表面上知寒问暖但实际玩家在Forma上给出的大批意见根本不去听取，甚至不做回应，没有什么能比两面三刀更恶心玩家的了。
3.DE给予玩家的感觉像是一个无头苍蝇，不知道向那个方向开发，好好Raid给扔了搞了平原但根本不能长期玩下去，平原刷了300-400次基本都是满赋能除了优雅和充沛但4%爆率真的让人失去刷的动力
4.游戏中最大的一个问题就是网络连接，DE采用的是P2P，这就导致了组人异常困难，除非氏族内熟人的稳定车队，很难组野队稳定的刷BOSS，80-120的ping都是非常常见开核桃什么的都无所谓，平原上就很难受了。
5.游戏开发进度十分缓慢，几个月不上都不会漏掉什么
6.游戏内光污染严重，大多数情况下，能量光会让你的屏幕白到什么都看不见。
7.每年Tennocon都画饼，但一年不如一年。
8.游戏实际上没有任何难度，有了指挥官在后期装备和赋能与天赋想要死都很难

73869187.review:
[h1]Witam serdecznie. W moich recenzjach na początku podaję skróconą wersję plusów i minusów gry, a niżej zawsze rozwijam kilka myśli, aby bardziej was przybliżyć do danego tytułu.[/h1]

Plusy:
- zróżnicowany poziom trudności
- stale dodawany nowy content
- przyjazna społeczność
- przeplatanie się "otwartego" i "zamkniętego" świata
- możliwość zdobycia 99% ekwipunku w trybie free2play
- tryby PvE oraz PvP

Minusy:
- konieczność farmienia = powtarzalność
- "trudno dostępna" fabuła

To co większość z was interesuje najbardziej mamy już za sobą. Zapraszam do dłuższej, ale przyjemniejszej lektury.

Warframe to przede wszystkim gra kooperacyjna, w której wcielamy się w Tenno - operatora tzw. Warframe'ów. Z czasem nasz asortyment będzie zawierał kilkadziesiąt tych skafandrów oraz ich ulepszone wersje. Każda "postać", którą przyjdzie nam grać posiada unikalny zestaw skilli (z małymi wyjątkami) oraz własny "build", który tworzymy z posiadanych kart ulepszeń - modów. 

Do rozegrania jest kilkanaście rodzajów misji, które różnią się poziomem trudności i lootem, który możemy na nich zebrać, a następnie zużyć do craftowania i ulepszania. Wśród misji są typowe obrony punktu, ratowanie zakładników, eksterminowanie wrogów itd. Niby nic nadzwyczajnego, ale później dochodzą także otwarte światy, które nie do poznania zmieniają naszą dotychczasową rozgrywkę. Posiadają osobne zestawy zasobów naturalnych, a co za tym idzie kolejne możliwości stworzenia potężnych przedmiotów.

Wierzcie mi, craftowania jest cała masa. Surowce zbieramy w dziesiątkach tysięcy. Wszystko ma swoje zastosowanie, każda nowa broń to radość odkrywania. Do stworzenia nowych warframe'ów oprócz zasobów musimy zazwyczaj wykonać quest związany z tą "postacią". Rozwój i stawanie się potęgą w tej grze są naprawdę satysfakcjonujące. W pewnym, momencie dochodzimy do etapu niszczenia całych armii wroga jednym skillem, a później już walczymy z "bogami" tego świata.

Niestety fabuła w tej grze jest niejako ukryta. O historii świata musimy się dowiadywać z zapisków rozrzuconych w grze poprzez tzw. kodeks zawierający informacje, a także nierzadko wikipedię, która wyjaśnia wiele spraw. Questy, które stanowią de facto większość fabuły, którą możemy poznać są bardzo oddalone od siebie pod względem momentu ich wykonania. Powiem prościej, każdy quest wymaga odpowiedniego poziomu naszego całego profilu, a więc niektórzy mogą nie poznać większości z nich.

Sam system levelowania jest prosty, ale czasochłonny. Zabijamy potwory, roboty i niby-ludzi, wykonujemy zadania i dostajemy doświadczenie do naszej broni (głównej, bocznej i białej), a także warframe'a, którym sterujemy. Maksymalny poziom to 30 (z czasem możliwy jest reset w celu ulepszenia), a potem należy zmienić nasz zestaw i wbić na 30 poziom kolejne bronie. Każda wymaksowana broń to doświadczenie do naszego ogólnego profilu tzw. mastery ranku. Stanowi on o faktycznym postępie naszego konta, odblokowuje nowe przedmioty, zadania i wiele innych funkcji w grze.

Możliwości jest naprawdę ogrom. Gra rozwijęła się do takiego poziomu, że klasyczne "daily", które znamy z innych gier tutaj są właściwie robotą na pół dnia. Mówię tutaj codziennie odnawiających się zadaniach, które dają nam bonusy, ale jeśli nie zdążymy ich zrobić, to przepadają. Do zwiedzenia mamy wiele planet, a każda z nich to inny zestaw doznań. Są planety skute lodem, wraki statków kosmicznych, otwarte połacie terenu i wiele innych.

Poza tymi wszystkimi wspaniałościami, dobrze przemyślanymi rozwiązaniami, olbrzymią gamą możliwości, a także podejmowaniem decyzji, z którymi frakcjami w grze chcemy się związać, należy wspomnieć o jednym bardzo ważnym "problemie". Otóż cała gra skupia się na farmieniu, grindowaniu surowców niezbędnych do rozwijania naszego arsenału. W zależności od skomplikowania tworzonego przedmiotu musimy się przygotować na kilkukrotne powtarzanie misji, co może zająć nawet kilka godzin, nim osiągniemy upragniony cel. Wiele potężnych przedmiotów wymaga od nas długiego i monotonnego poszukiwania komponentów, co może zniechęcać ludzi, którzy przede wszystkim cenią sobie szybko zmieniającą się i wartką akcję.



Na koniec mam dla was jeszcze małą ciekawostkę. Jeśli lubicie gaming i poszukujecie grupy, która przede wszystkim stawia na silne więzi w internecie, ale nie tylko, to zajrzyjcie tutaj:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/ejem] Elitarna Jednostka Eksterminacji Mutantów[/url]

Poza tym, jeśli ta recenzja wam się spodobała lub była pomocna, to nie zapomnijcie jej odpowiednio ocenić ;)

73336683.review:
Every time I come back to this game, remembering how fun the combat and other basic mechanics were, I find myself immediately uninstalling it again afterwards. I consistently end up feeling annoyed and distracted by the layers upon layers of tacked-on mechanics that fail to complement one another, let alone the core game.

It's not deep, it's just bloated. This game could have been good, if DE just knew when to stop hastily slapping on yet more minigames and focused on what actually gives this game substance; combat and equipment.

Warframe is the concept of "feature creep" given form, and I'm genuinely sad that it ended up this way. It could have been so much better.

73668789.review:
O czym jest?

Gra polega na czymś bardzo prostym. Wybierasz Warframe (coś na zasadzie klasy postaci). Na wejściu masz jeden z trzech do wyboru. Jest to bez większego znaczenia ponieważ resztę możesz zdobyć później jak i dużo więcej innych nowych w wersji podstawowej lub ulepszonej zwanej jako "Prime". Skupiasz się na wbijaniu Master Rank, które jest czymś na zasadzie poziomu Twojego konta. Im wyższy MR tym więcej rzeczy do odblokowania of Warframów do Broni i Petów. Wszystko powstaje przy pomocy craftingu więc i gra opiera się głównie na gridndowaniu surowców potrzebnych do tworzenia nowych rzeczy. Rozgrywka polega na rozgrywaniu misji fabularnych, krótkich misjach instancjowych trwających od paru minut wzwyż lub explorowaniu otwartych planet.

Plusy:
+grafika
+rozgrywka
+community
+klany i możliwość budowania własnej siedziby klanu "Dojo"
Minusy
-tony grindu
-crafting może trwać od 1min do 72h (można przyśpieszać przy pomocy waluty premium, którą można pozyskiwać za darmo po przez handel z innymi graczami przedmiotami, które zdobywamy podczas gry)

Opinia:
Gra jest kozak, gra się bardzo przyjemnie choć głównie gram solo. Aktualnie 216h przegranych "casualowo" i na pewno wpadnie ich dużo więcej. Osobiście polecam ten tytuł z czystym sumieniem.

72993280.review:
[h1]新手入坑噩梦[/h1]
游戏不错，但是新手指引做的太差，没人带很难玩进去。实际上从段位成就来看就知道绝大部分人新手期还没过就退坑了。玩了36个小时，完全不知道在玩什么。谈谈我的看法。
先说优点
1：玩法丰富，战甲，武器，mod的搭配还有一大堆活动可以玩（36个小时的独狼，这些我绝大部分都没接触到）
2：技能炫酷，基本上官方外挂，飞天，隐身，自瞄基本上都能做到（当然这些全是中后期才能接触到的）
3：社区氛围不错
4：好像确实不氪，只要肝就行
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
然后就是我个人主观的缺点
1：新手入坑难度极大，2段好像也就20％的人达到了。我现在才4段，人更少了，在贴吧看到不少9段还说萌新的，这.............. 要不是大概了解，我肯定以为是那种大佬装萌新的梗。但事实好像确实是这样，9段那些估计也是刚入门。

2：剧情，不是说剧情有问题。现在打到土星，在这之前的剧情我也就知道一开始tenno被唤醒，然后抵抗那什么将军，拆除蛔虫装置。不是我不想看剧情，每次莲妈讲剧情，我又要子弹跳又要瞄准打怪，这游戏节奏又快，我看左边她在讲什么，就顾不上打怪，还有可能一跳，呕吼，跳死了。我要打怪，又要跑图，就顾不上剧情。所以我每次都是一脸懵的进去，杀穿，然后一脸懵的出来。

3：还是新手指引，我找到的大部分新手怎么过度里面都说建议找个氏族一起玩，这是准备封死独狼玩家的路呗。
还有最气的一点，在b站查怎么快速获得在平原飞行的能力，看视频刷好了鱼油什么的一大堆材料，最后一步居然要什么发射模块，百度了一下，要在氏族里面获得那什么图（另外一种方法感觉更难）当初视频里面可没提到这点。

4:一些任务让我玩的很暴躁，间谍倒是简单。就是那个占领ABCD点的那个玩的我头疼，想要获胜至少要占2个点，1个人经常守不住，来回跑，头疼，他要不是在主线路径上我才懒得做那吊玩意。

5：前期没玩下去的动力。一步登天是不可能的，但是这游戏给我的感觉是看不到登天的方法，这点不知道怎么说。就拿我以前玩过的一款手游---剑魂之刃 为例。前期我很弱，没好装备，好武器，但主线玩下来，我装备慢慢的能升级，打不过了，没技术打怎么办？去做一件好装备，刷材料做武器，最后堆数值压制过去，有时候运气好，刷出来某个nb武器的图，肝几天做出来，接着打主线，去做更好的装备。 但这游戏，woc大佬的甲好帅，好强，我主线还没通呢。咖喱棒接着砍，越玩越无聊，开核桃开出来某个甲图，很高兴，然后问题来了，其他部件的核桃没有，现阶段我估计也刷不出来，材料又在哪刷，哦材料知道在哪刷了，抱歉，这个星球查无此物。如果前期不想刷，有钱交易频道直接买一套，还是一样，主线都没通，那些常用的mod一个没有，还不如咖喱棒一路砍呢。
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
我想过找代肝的，发现tb上500w星币+3套甲要200，好像还带配卡（这是最便宜的套餐，够买一款3A了，想想看还是算了）
总的来说就是，新手没人带玩起来太难受了，我玩36个小时基本上没感觉到自己哪变强了，我都不知道自己究竟在按玩个啥。warframe是不准备吸引新玩家了吗？感觉干不过隔壁命运2

73702681.review:
Don't know how the hell i managed to rack up 3000 hours... I keep coming back when there are new updates, and have not uninstalled this game ever.

Some advice for new players:
1. DON'T overexert yourselves by grinding. E.g. if you've only been playing for a month or so, you shouldn't be grinding endo for rank 10 mods, nor kuva for RNG riven rolls. Gear progression isn't everything, and there is plenty of game content to be explored. I sometimes run level100 missions using excalibur and mk-1 starting equipment for the kicks, and its works fine because of my knowledge on mod combinations and how to deal with enemies. If you are a completionist, bad news... [spoiler]prepare for the worst ;)[/spoiler]
2. What to spend platinum on: Prioritize using plat on increasing warframe / weapon slots. If you have extra, spend them on orokin reactors and catalysts for your favourite frames and weapons.
3. Trading exists, and can save you many hours of grinding. You can sell things you think are junk (duplicate relics, prime parts, mods and whatnot), but are worth much more for others, and buy what you need within minutes. You might need some time learning how to, but there are free tools like the warframe market website to help with trading.
4. "Press 4 to win" used to be a thing. Meaning, current metas will be nerfed to oblivion, and so will the next many. You do not have to follow min/max builds. Instead, try new weapons and frames to learn them, while making do with your current mods. That's what the mastery system is imo, learning which weapons and frames are better suited for different situations. If you leveling your weapons by afking in grineer defense missions, you're essentially throwing that piece of knowledge away.
5. How to get plat? : Sell your soul by grinding and/or trading. [spoiler]might shorten your lifespan by a few years.[/spoiler] OR buy using real $ OR wait for 75% plat discount login reward and buy using $, which only appeared for me twice since i started playing.

73859437.review: Alrighty, so I rarely leave reviews, but quite frankly, at this point I feel like I should. Ive poured my soul into this game and its been a fantastic run. This game has outstanding graphics and the optimization is solid. The gameplay and the in-game movement and parkour is a really fun addition to the game and really makes the game fast paced (at most times; the game still does have its dull moments). For a free to play game, youre getting so much gameplay and you can really pour some serious time into this game (currently at 1,804 hours atm). The game isnt without its flaws though. There are a few bugs that irritate the heck out of me such as mission waypoints bugging out and not displaying properly or the rare moments of falling through the map when deploying my K-Drive. Even with all the bugs though, I always find myself coming back to this game. The customization is also really something else. You have so many different options for skins, armor pieces and colors that you really can make your warframes stand out even amongst the same frames. The modding system (upgrade system) is also really extensive. If you really like a frame, you can mod it to the way you want to play so you can really excel at what you do. You can pretty much tune your frame to the way you want to play so theres so much freedom with making your builds. There's so much more I could say about this game but all im going to say is its definitely worth the time (and money) ive put into it. If youre on the fence on whether you should get it, give it a chance. Theres very little tutorial but if you find a helpful higher MR player thats willing to show you the ropes, give it some time. You will get it. You will want to join a clan early on for the extra tech that you get from being in one. Well, thats all i have to say for now. Good luck Tenno!

73977317.review:
First lemme say this; it is a grind game. So if you like destiny or things of that nature then I'd recommend this one. If not then you may wanna just move on to another game. 
Story: At the beginning there isn't much to the story (this it pre-Heart of Deimos release) it has a basic "kill the bad guys cuz they're bad" kinda story. However It DOES improve and add a bunch of depth as you progress with meaningful cinematic quests and lore.
Gameplay: You like ninjas? How about space ninjas? Flashy gear and strange weapons? Well if you do this game has it all and then some. Melee weapons, sidearms, rifles, bows, lasers, RPG bows, microwave gun, and even rubber chicken like bombs. You level these weapons to gain mastery to gain access you even better gear. As you go through the "starchart" enemy levels increase as does difficulty. Even the characters themselves level up. Each character or "Warframe" has its own unique abilities and stats to suit your playstyle. You can upgrade and modify a weapons behavior in various ways to better suit you needs on a mission by mission basis using mods. Mods that change firerate, damage type, ammo capacity, and damage potential all can be earned in game by simply playing. Some mods are super rare while other rain from the sky.
Free to Play: Yes, this game is free to play and you know what that means. In game purchases with real money are there BUT these items such as Tennogen are exclusively cosmetic. These you do need to shell out 5-7$ for as well as the Prime access exclusive cosmetics which only come with the prime packs you can get for 50-150$. These packs are instant unlocks to the new "prime" gear added to the game. You DO NOT need to buy these packs to get the new gear. You can obtain them in game through its own mode. All progress leads to more space to get more gear. The in game premium currency is called Platinum and can be purchased with real money. However, this is not the only way to get Platinum in game, you can instead trade valuable mods or gear parts to other players in the games trade chat. Thus you can get almost everything in the game by earning these valuable items and trading them without spending a cent.
Overall this game is fun and I do recommend it.

73833175.review:
[b]Gráficos[/b]

Uma amiga recentemente me perguntou qual jogo tinha o melhor gráfico: Destiny 2 ou Warframe? Essa é uma pergunta complicada. Para mim, ambos os jogos são excelentes, mas de certa forma Destiny 2 é um pouco mais otimizado do que o Warframe.

Eu iniciei o jogo numa GTX 1650, então as configurações de vídeo da maioria dos jogos nunca foi um grande problema para mim. Já recebi relatos de amigos, no entanto, que rodavam em placas de vídeo inferiores e eles sempre reclamaram de problemas nas duas principais cidades do jogo: Fortuna e Cetus. Ou seja, no geral, o jogo é bem otimizado, exceto nessas duas grandes cidades.

Ah, e tem determinados cenários lindos, coisa do tipo: quero parar de jogar e ficar apreciando a vista. É a mesma sensação que eu tinha com Destiny 2, de ficar parado apenas apreciando a paisagem.

[b]Gameplay[/b]

O jogo pode se tornar repetitivo após uma quantidade X de horas. Ou seja, muitos dizem que o Warframe é um jogo de grind. E é mesmo. Mas a Digital Extremes (no qual, vou chamar de DE para facilitar) está sempre adicionando conteúdo e história. Pode até ficar chato após um tempo, mas sempre vai ter conteúdo novo, então por mim não se tornou chato ao ponto de eu desistir de jogar ou coisa parecida.

E pelo menos tem umas conquistas legais XD

[b]Áudio[/b]

Vou me resumir ao fato de que recentemente fiz uma cirurgia (simples, mas ainda assim uma cirurgia) ouvindo uma das trilhas sonoras de Warframe. Tanto os efeitos sonoros quanto a trilha sonora é muito linda. 

[b]Audiência e comunidade[/b]

Meu grande problema com jogos online sempre foi a comunidade. Um jogo que me encantava muito, mas terminou ficando extremamente chato por conta da comunidade tóxica foi Overwatch. Infelizmente, as ações tomadas pela Blizzard demoram e muitas vezes são ineficazes. 

Por Warframe ser mais que um jogo de "DPS" e sim um MMO e ter o conceito de clãs bem definido, as regras dos clãs terminam tornando o ambiente um local muito mais agradável (talvez seja por isso que tornei parte da moderação de um dos clãs!). Percebi também que a comunidade é muito honesta, principalmente quando tentamos comprar itens de outros jogadores. Uma vez fui comprar um item que era 51 platinas e por estar com sono, coloquei 52. O outro jogador prontamente me avisou antes de aceitar a compra. 1 platina não faria diferença nenhuma para ele, mas mesmo assim ele resolveu me alertar.

[b]Dificuldade[/b]

Eu poderia falar que o jogo é fácil, mas depende muito de uma série de itens. Por exemplo, ao desbloquear todo o mapa estelar (coisa que ainda não fiz rs), você terá acesso ao que chamam de Arbitragem, que permite farmar certos itens. Com o recente update da DE, agora também existe o Steel Path, que é como se fosse um modo "difícil". Pode ser dificultoso para alguns jogadores que estiverem com a build errada ou que não sabem jogar em grupo.

[b]História[/b]

A história é linda, apesar de estar incompleta. Queria muito que virasse um filme ;(

[b]Preço[/b]

Alguns podem falar que o jogo é Pay To Win, por ter compra de platinas no jogo. Mas ao mesmo conheço algumas pessoas que conseguiram milhares de platina vendendo apenas itens do jogo. As platinas não te darão uma assinatura, até por que, não existe essa opção. Elas compram espaço de equipamento/armas/Warframes, permitem acelerar o tempo de construção de alguns itens (que demoram muito), permitem comprar itens de outros jogadores. Mas também permitem que você venda seus itens em troca de platina. Em resumo, eu recomendaria comprar um pacote de 4.000 platinas quando você obtiver o desconto de 75% e tentar farmar o máximo de itens para compensar o valor gasto e até mesmo fazer mais do que você comprou.

[b]Bugs[/b]

Pode ter alguns bugs, mas eles são sempre consertados. Já teve uma semana que recebemos um hotfix por dia. Pode ser chato para pessoas com internet fraca, mas é melhor do que jogar um jogo "bugado".

I love every moment of this game. Starting out this game starts you off as a Warframe you have chosen. A Mag, Excaulibur, Volt. I recommend Mag because she's pretty easy to fight in the junctions as you progress with the game. Excaulibur, he's like that noob Warframe most people think are cool but hey I'm not judging, I just recommend Mag because it's pretty helpful. There are 100's of weapons, 30+ something of Warframes. You can have companions, space dogs!

This anime I have watched, years ago. It's called Evangelion. Basically there's these teenagers who go inside robots, they fight these aliens, these bosses. It is fascinating how people just create these amazing sci-fi stories. Star Trek, Battlestar Galactica, Firefly. Sometimes I rewatch these shows because I still love them. There is still a community who still follow them.

The content in this game is basically grinding a lot, having that mental list in your head or keeping track what you need to do. Looking at the wiki, years worth of tutorials online. You're gonna need them. it's the truth about looter shooter games, you basically grind and grind over again and for what. Ask yourself, "I'm I having fun?" If yes, you came to the right door of the tenno heaven. 

Story is pretty interesting, won't spoil. It's something like where this story suddenly gets created over years by people who smoked a lot of stuff. It is something that makes you think. "How do they think of these?" 

For the people who think this game is Pay 2 Win, it isn't honestly. You choose if you want to progress quickly but don't. People who are patient are rewarded. I mean like crafting, you will love that you took the time to wait. On consoles, creators were paid to have their cosmetics cost platinum but not on PC. So yes, people actually spend money to look cool. Look at Path Of Exile for an example, there is like cosmetics, skins and effects that are worth 100$+. It's a free game right. Well, you basically can choose what you want to pay with your money. Probably best to spend it safely. 

I met many amazing people while I was playing. Now I have people that I play with, helping me, helping them. It's just an amazing game that brings people together. Wanna know why? It's because you need to have that mindset where you just need to be in that chill mood to play games. You don't have to look at the flaws, just have fun with the game. Honestly, just trust me with this one. In any game, sure we have bad games, great fantastic games. 

You see these TennoGen creations where these bunch of people created cool skins for your items. My favorite are the Warframe skins, I haven't bought one yet but I will in the future.

My final conclusion to this review, here's the final part. It gets overwhelming, fast paced. Baby steps as you grow up to become one of those old players in Warframe. It's like a ladder to see your progression. Think about it as life, think about how you have changed so much. Do I have any regrets in my 100+ hours journey? The important part are the happy memories, look back at them. Love your family, friends. People around you in this game, are your family.

The game itself feels chewy and fast paced but has that familiar feeling of putting on your old comfortable slippers when you get home in that it's not super tense, and the variable mission types and difficulties lets you set your own level of tension, and even low-end missions can be profitable if, for example, you're searching for ayatan sculptures or speedrunning to farm a specific resource or crack relics

73688222.review:
I've paid a total of $12 USD and have Amazon Prime and three prime Warframes and I sat in the Tennocon Twitch stream while watching playoff hockey and got some other free stuff.

I have no idea what I'm doing most of the time. I have exactly one trillion hours in Destiny 2 on Xbox and PC.

Those are random thoughts, and this is a random review. So far, I have enjoyed my time. Like 70-80 hours. There is grinding, because it's an action-RPG-MMO-type thing. I'm sure there's a better acronym for it, but I won't get bogged down in labels. I'm having a fine time.

The community is really helpful. Everyone I've played with has been respectful and helpful. This game doesn't grab me like a lot of games, like Destiny, but it doesn't cause me the anxiety that Destiny causes. And I don't really mean to call out Destiny or anything, really. I use D2 as an example simply because that's what I play the most. I find Warframe's casual atmosphere very relaxing and refreshing.

If you take a little bit of time to read up on a few systems, and put like a tiny bit of money into this very free game, I think you'll have a good time if you're into a casual action experience. And from what I can tell, you'll have a good time if you go in pretty hardcore as well.

It's a fair F2P. You get what you pay for and you get what you play for. It took me a little while to get the hang of things, and it took a bit to get its hooks in, and I'm still not sure how long I'll stick around. I know I don't come off as the greatest ambassador for the game, but I can only speak for myself. It's a fun experience and I'll keep playing. The grind isn't too bad. It's a grind, and grinds exist, and there will always be grinds. But again, and not to make this a slogan, but it really is true: You get what you pay for and you get what you play for.

I hope you try it, and I hope you have fun. Take your time. Take it slow. Read some guides, some forums, watch some videos. Or just go in blind and figure out everything for yourself.

And one last note: It's encouraging to me that the official forum's biggest community board outside of General Discussion is titled "Players helping Players." That's the sense I've gotten so far in-game.

Also, out of all my reviews, this might be the only serious one I've ever written. So read into that however you like.

73401026.review:
I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ing minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

73133875.review:
I am going to assume that a curious one that is unfamiliar with Warframe is reading this and is wondering: What is Warframe? Is there a lot of content? How many items and warframes are there?

To these questions, I have an answer summed up in a simple sentence: Warframe is a third-person perspective shooty-blasty-slashy game with 7(+) years of the good ol' devs' work into it, making it have a wealth of content, weapons (over 300 of them) and warframes (currently 43 of 'em, and that -excludes- 'frame variants) to chose from!

If you are a new player, there is so much to do; I mean, just look at how much of my life I spent playing it, lol

At 4,447 hours in, I uninstalled the game. Why you say?--Is the game bad? Nope! It's just that I got my hours in and enjoyed my time with the game.  I liked the community and all that snazzy "Tennogen" Fashion-frame stuff; I really loved supporting fellow Tenno, artists or otherwise! It was a blast, and frankly, I REALLY don't think I spent this amount of time with any other game as of writing this, so massive kudos to the whole experience and to all the people who made it possible!

So, go ahead and give it a try if you are curious! You can even join or make a clan! Have fun, Tenno!

Much love,
Mebbles



PS- Don't  worry too much about riven weapon mods! If you find them via rewards, then good!--Just think twice before you spend like over 100 Platinum on one in a listing somewhere and thinking they'll be the same forever; the stat strength flux so much with the times due to changes in game balance, so ya, that's my really only major gripe with the game is the riven... stuff. Just be wary of it and avoid hyper-focusing on rivens, and you'll do just fine!

72836997.review:
The early game is quite boring at times, but if you manage to get over it, it can become quite a timesink.
Great coop potential as you can play the same stuff with a friend who played thousand hours more than you and they still get stuff for it they can use. The game also has quite frequent contentdrops you can enjoy (although some of these are not that exquisite and you'll entirely skip over them or barely touch it).

Pros:
+ A truely F2P experience - You don't need to pay a single dime to have "premium" content. You can also trade for the premium currency with items you can just farm out.
+ Several hundred hours worth of content
+ Frequent sales - If you still want to support the devs and get some currency for it, the game quite often gives you a 75% discount on packages.
+ Memes
+ Easy to learn in, but quite hard to master.
+ Frequent balance changes
+ Great ish story

Cons:
- Timesinker - Some of the contents just take an insane amount of grinding to get while offering barely anything in return.
- New main quest are rarely added - You can grind through those main quests in a few weeks at most and then you wont really get even one for several months.
- Several content has a daily cap on them requiring you to play for several days rather than just one sitting. They do scale based on your mastery level but when a Tier4>Tier5 standing upgrade requires you to have 99k points on you while your daily cap is at 13k wtih Mastery 12 it just becomes a chore quite honestly. Especially when you realize that 13k takes you a little more than 30 minutes.
- Balance changes - Although its quite a positive thing considering you wont just use one set to kill everything, its still quite a punch in the face when you just farmed out that meta set for several hundred platinums and realize that the next patch obliterates it and makes it mediocre at best.

72581492.review: While most sci-fi games draw their influence from Star Trek or Star Wars, Warframe appears to be influenced by French sci-fi such as Valerian and Laureline as well as the works of Moebius. Warframe is very fun, but it is also very grind intense. Many mechanics and systems are obfuscated, requiring the player to dig through a poorly organized Codex or consult the Internet for answers. There are years of content that will likely take at least 100 hours to complete. To describe Warframe in a word, overwhelming. Though it is free-to-play, you will have the best experience by investing a little bit of money into Platinum (premium currency) to increase your amount of inventory slots. If you can overcome these pitfalls, you will find a rewarding online shooter set in a compelling universe.

72496759.review: Underneath all the grind and bugs is a shining gem of scifi lore and storytelling. You won't see it coming, but this game has a story, and it's really good. It's also free, and with fewer in game purchases than some games that have the audacity to make you buy a copy first. I played through almost the whole story before I finally decided the hundreds of hours of enjoyment (i used to play on the independent launcher) I've had in game warranted giving DE some of my hard earned cash. This game is completely free to play, and free to win. I'd say just download it and give it a try. It's the tightest looter shooter I've played to date, with great movement, super fun and unique weapons, and a TON of independent character classes in the wide variety of warframes (which you can all get without spending money, it just takes some (usually) reasonable grinding). You pay nothing to give this game a try, so just go for it. It's really grindy, but because it's free to play, just try it and see if it's your thing.

72437490.review:
This game is a fantastic example of a free to play game and outdoes many full price, $60 titles. Everything, besides many of the cosmetic items, is attainable for free and items can be sold for the in-game currency so technically everything is obtainable without spending a dime if you're very, very dedicated. Gameplay is smooth, action-oriented, and fast. Environments are traversable via a number of ways that are all quite fun, from the acrobatic, ninja-like movement that comes default to every warframe to hoverboards and flight in the open world sections of the game. Stealth gameplay is also an option with additional experience/rewards in missions that incentivize it. Graphically the game looks great, the open world areas are gorgeous especially for a free title and, in the case of areas like Fortuna, can be incredibly immersive. 

The primary purpose of the game is to grind up new Warframes/gear and collect everything so, as a result, the game can be quite repetitive. The bulk of the game is in the combat system so you'll be doing that the majority of the time, there are a few opportunities to take a break and do things like decorate your ship or clan dojo which can be fun but for the most part you'll be flying through levels and blasting things. There are numerous opportunities to customize your Warframe and develop a playstyle that fits your taste, each Warframe is customizable with mods that affect your performance to varying levels of efficacy so it can be quite fun to establish and work towards a specific build.

Overall the game is quite enjoyable and warrants a few hours of gameplay, it's completely free so there's absolutely no harm in checking it out and I highly advise you to should you have the spare time and hard drive space.

73630928.review:
Here's how it's going down.
Step 1: You're completely overwhelmed by the complexity and variability of this game.
Step 2: You grind through the boring start of the story because your friends tell you it's getting better.
Step 3: You slowly start to learn how the game works. Interesting part of the story begins.
Step 4: You grind hours and hours for new mods and parts while watching a lot of Netflix on your other screen or phone.
Step 5: You have completely abandoned your real life, but still feel accomplished because you finally got that mod you were looking for.
Step 6: You have got all the gear and all the idea.
Step 7: You hunt for the fashion items to let everyone KNOW that you completely lost your connection to reality. You look pretty dope tho.
Step 8: You got all the fashion items and slowly start to realise that the grineer have not yet taken over earth, even though your boss seems to be one of them and your colleagues are about as smart as them.

72938729.review:
Is Warframe great? Absolutely
Would I recommend it? Yes, to anyone that isn't me.

Warframe is a fast paced hack & slash/TPS, has a ton of content & is exactly the type of game that could reel me in for ages to come....... If I had the time to dedicate to it & I wasn't an old man. My problems with Warframe really just fall on having to chase timers in respect to dailies & expiration of buffs. Sometimes I'll log in & get a buff that lasts for 4 hours or have to pound out a crap ton of dailies/weeklies before I run out of time. Now I'm not faulting the game for this. I'm just saying this is not what I'm in the mood to do, not anymore at least. My other issue is that this is clearly a KBM game & my old-ass hands can't stay in the 'KBM claw' position for extended periods of time(like 4 hours in 1 sitting). If this came out when I was a kid, there would have been no removing me from the PC. This is just not for me.

72570081.review:
このレビューではほかのレビューでマイナス点として挙げられてる点や不満点の改善方法などを説明しておきます。（アプデで色々変わる可能性はあります）
・無課金ゲーだけど課金しないと辛くね？
確かに序盤は無課金だと素材も不足気味だったりクレジットも不足気味、フレームを飾る外装も基本課金じゃん。となりますが1武器揃えるだけなら割と辛くないです。課金通貨も他人からのトレードで入手…というかトレードの通貨がソレなんで、需要のあるものを掘れる段階である程度稼ぐことはできます。もちろん序盤にある程度課金するとかなりストレスフリーにはなりますが…。
・無課金で木星まで来たけど敵強くね？硬くね？痛くね？
このゲームでの強化はMODが殆どなので組みかた次第で驚くほど火力差が出ます。例としては”とりあえず未強化のMODでも埋めたほうが強いよね”や”元のクリティカル率低いけどクリティカル率増加積んでおくか”とか”速度遅くて振りにくい近接だけどとりあえず威力だけ盛ればいいよね”等々。あとこのゲームで装備を終盤で使う場合オロキンカタリスト（オロキンリアクター）などでコスト最大値を上げる前提になります。序盤のクエストでもらえたりナイトウェーブというデイリー要素から入手できますが無課金で序盤だと結構貴重品（序盤はなくても問題はない）ため中盤以降に差し掛かるところでメイン武器を選定しておいて使ってあげると良いでしょう。一応課金するとかなり安く手に入るので多少気兼ねなく使えます。
・ドアロックされてるわけじゃないのにドア開かねぇ、ホストがラグい、中国人とばっかりマッチングする。
ミッション中のマッチング鯖はオプションで変更可能です。北米にしたりPing上限を２００～２５０ほどにしておくとラグいと感じることも減るし英語圏の人と良く当たるので英語ならある程度って人は変更すると良いでしょう。
・ゴールどこ？MAPでアイコン見えるけど枠外で解らねぇよ。など
MAPは大体ブロック構造なので誘導部分も大体は出入口にマーカー設置されていることが多いです。マップを拡大するととても見やすくなるので迷った場合は拡大するとよいです。たまにマーカーが仕事しなくなることもありますが頻繁に起こりませんしブロック構造ゆえにとりあえず部屋間の出入り口まで移動すれば解決する場合も多いです。
・装備の殆どゴミじゃね？RivenMODとかいうMOD性能落ちるようなMOD要る？ミッションの種類少なくね？ドロップ率低すぎやろ等
ミッションの少なさは他ゲでもおつかいが殆どなので個人的に少ないと感じたことはないですが。個人的見解としてはこのゲームはカスタム要素が豊富な無双系ゲームだと思います。後半できることが増えてくると色々な装備で色々な戦い方ができるようになります。もちろん最適な装備で組むとかなり爆速でこなせたりしますのでそういう人からするとそれ以下の装備はゴミに見えるかもしれません。ただ、個性的なフレームや武器が豊富で快適にクリアするのに必須になる装備のレベルというのもかなり低い目に設定されています。低いドロップ率も敵がワラワラ湧いてきてミッションによったら数分で３００キルしてるなんてこともザラなんで雑魚ドロップは大体気づいたら持ってることが多いです。RivenMODは一応ガチャ要素ですが元のコンセプトが不遇武器の救済用MODという立ち位置なので人気武器は徐々に性能が下がります、使用率が減った武器は上がっていきます。これは先ほど挙げたある程度のラインまで不遇な武器を引き上げるのにとても大事な要素となっています。見た目や発射音などが気に入ってるけど性能が心もとないなどの場合に使うと良いでしょう。
・制作時間長すぎ、地位の1日上限とか要る？
このゲームでそれなくすとコンテンツの消費速度がヤベーのでまぁ、これくらいは仕方ないかと思っています。一応ある程度の改善策はありますが、武器は制作して受け取らなければ装備枠を圧迫しないので作るだけ作って受け取り待ちさせておく。スマホアプリでゲーム内のファウンドリ（制作台）管理できるものが公式であるのでそれを活用する。地位は交換アイテムとして貯蓄しておける形態のものもあったり上限を無視してある程度稼げるコンテンツが併設されていたり（シンジケートミッションなど）するので有効活用しましょう。

あとはクラン関連ですが、クラン活動的なものがないクランが体感多いです。というのもクランの研究が終わっていればあとはそこから入手できる装備の設計図はコピーしてくるだけでクランに負担が一切ないためです。なので装備のためだけで無言だったりするけど行けますか？程度でも誘ってくれるクランは割といるので聞くだけ聞いてみるのも手です。

※初心者へのアドバイス
木星からエウロパに行く際の課題にスペクターの製造（救出ミッションで設計図入手）がありますが8時間かかるので予め作っておくとスムーズに進めます。
冥王星からセドナに行く際にMR5以上の武器製造が課題になってます。引っかかることは少ないですが意識しておくとよいでしょう。
使わない武器でもマーケットなどからとりあえず購入・製造してランクを上げましょう。MRが上がれば新しい武器も使えるようになります。
ランク上げは各星の耐久や防衛ミッション、特にMAP時に素材＋〇％などが書いてるダークセクターという場所によく野良がいます。野良の人がキルした分は装備全体に分配されるため育ちが早くなります。ソロなら潜入を回すとよいでしょう。
ゲーム内で分り辛い場合はWikiみると大体まとめられてたりするので日本語Wiki見るとよいです。コンテンツ多いわりに更新も頻繁でコメントも割と活発なので情報源としては最適です。トレードに関してもそこを参照するとよいでしょう。
あとみんな序盤は苦労してたせいか初心者の質問に答えてくれたり手伝ってくれたりする経験者は割と多いです。どうしてもわからなかった場合は色々聞くのも手です。

ざっと上げられるのがこの辺くらい。チュートリアル不足だ！解説不足だ！不親切だ！という人も多い…というか最近の国産ゲームのチュートリアルが完備しすぎてるせいだとは思いますがコンテンツ量がかなり多く多分普通に説明いれてもクッソややこしくなるだけなのでこれくらいのチュートリアルで十分だと個人的に思ってます。多少進めれば試射場に当たる部分も利用できたりMODなどのドロップ先がゲーム内で見れたりなど必要な情報は大体詰め込んでくれています。多すぎるのでわざわざ目の前にぶら下げに来てくれないだけですね。
総評すると、高いアクション性に加えて高いカスタマイズ要素を備えた無双系ゲームです。他ゲで1キャラだけ重点的に育てて最強目指すぜって人には多分向いてませんが、色々なキャラ使いたいでもキャラごとに装備揃えるの辛い…同じキャラで周回続けるの辛いって人にはかなりオススメできます。上に上げた通り情報量が多くカスタマイズ要素も慣れが要るが他ゲも色々手だしててこれ超えるアクション性とカスタマイズ性を備えたゲームを見つけれていません。というレベルのゲームです。

To play the mission *A* we need a key called *B* which can be found in the mission *C*. Ok then we go to *C*, but it's locked because we need to first finish this episode called *D*, Oookay, go to the episode *D* and complete it. Then discovered that is just a single blueprint of this *B* key and we need another 3 resources called *E* *F* and *G* to craft the *B* key. *E* resource can be found in *H* planet, but it's locked behind the Episode *I*. Ok so, to get the *E* resource we must unlock *H* planet so lets do right the opposite of what we want and play what we don't like instead, let's do the Episode *I* just to unlock the planet access. Ok after hours planet *H* is unlocked yay!, but the *E* resource just drops in one mission and the planet has 10 locked missions one behind another, sigh, so let's do the next missions to reach the *E* farm. Oook done, finally after even more hours and days we can properly farm the *E* resource. Ok to get the *E* resource we must fight this boss in this *H* planet with a 5% drop chance endlessly. The *F* resource can be found in the *S* mission, but can not be played if we don't have the orb thingy AKA the *J* key which can be crafted with the *K*, *L*, and *M* resources and the respective *J* blueprints, which can only be available if we previously completed the episode *N* because it allows us to go to the planet *Z*. So yeah sigh, lets do the Episode *N* to unlock the *S* mission in the planet *Z*, done after more hours, days, weeks and pain, lets farm those resources *K*, *L*, and *M* in different and extremely repetitive one clicky spamming missions, let's hurry and craft this thingy of key called *J* but wait... the game forces you to wait 24 real life hours to get it, 24 real life hours of proccess. after weeks finally we can farm the *F* resource, so the thing is now, to get ridiculous amounts of the *F* resource we must find a party in the chat and repeat the same *S* mission during hours, days and weeks for the rest of our entire game to collect the neccesary amount of *F* resource CONSTANTLY because *F* is also needed for other multiple recipes, like weapons and is not only exclusive for the *B* key crafting thingy, alright... sweating. The *G* resource can be found in the mission *T* which is the most repetitive and boring mission ever in the entire game that everyone hates and nobody ever plays so you hardly ever find anyone willing to help you and with a extremely very low % drop chance, and it's indeed locked, *T* can only be played if you previously completed the episode *I*, the episode *N* and the episode *O*, the mission *P* and after succesfuly defeated the boss *Q* only available if you got the required key called *R* to access his fortress which can only be crafted with the items *U*, *V* and *W* that can be found in the *X* and *Y* planet but only if you unlocked the *Z* planet first, and the most important thing about the *G* item is that it dissapear after 24 hours so you must farm it constantly for the rest of your entire game no matter what because is needed for another ton of recipes, not only the *B* key.

Yeah you got the idea, I asked for professional help after this. This "game" is gone.

73086202.review: Difficult to learn the movement controls and item upgrade flow. Amazingly fun to play once those things are memorized. You're basically a cyborg space ninja thrown into a future where a sadistic megacorporation is at war with a horde of murderous degenerated clones for control of the solar system while a parasitic plague is consuming both sides due to their carelessness. As an independent fourth party in this free-for-all, you're basically against everyone by default as you shoot and slash your way through missions on every planet (and some moons) until enough progress has been made that you can handle the game on your own, and your mission objectives turn towards quests and lore discovery instead. And BOY HOWDY is the lore to this universe fascinating! From the insane variety of abilities you have at your disposal (with each warframe essentially being a character class with 4 unique combat abilities and its own passive effect in ADDITION to the weapons you carry), to the weapons you can unlock and upgrade for ridiculous attack styles (including an electrical cable-turned-whip that deals explosive gas damage, and a flamethrower that makes enemies cold, or a laser rifle that gives enemies viral toxins), to the missions and rewards and story involved between them... there's just an endless amount of fun to be had here. My best friend has been playing this have for two years and he hasn't explored everything. I've been playing for two weeks now and I can easily understand why. There's no chance of me getting tired of Warframe soon, and I sincerely recommend giving it more than 10 hours if you want to try it out for yourself.

73084465.review: This is quite an easy game to play. Once you get better, it gets easier and you learn new techniques to do better in each match. The game also has pleasing graphics. The fact that its so detailed in the design for each character, enemy, or even an inanimate object, is very good. The graphics can be lowered enough to have it run on low end pc's as well. The mechanics of this game are really good as well, adding even more to this already incredible game, but every now and then they do tend to mess up. There is more to this game than you think too. There is a dojo where you are able to get certain items, a whole lot of levels on each planet, very well made free roam areas, and so much more. All of this for free and in just a small amount of storage. Overall, if you get this game, you will not be disappointed.

This game is a blast when you first start out as a new player & begin to get the hang of the mechanics, its systems, and its fundamentals. But after you've experienced what most of the content has to offer you're mostly just going to be grinding the same missions over and over again to get your mastery level up on shitty weapons and then you'll be waiting for months on end for new content updates that are [i]mostly always[/i] going to be mediocre, disappointing, underwhelming, or are just straight up bad. 

End game doesn't exist either. Not much of a reason to continue playing after you've got what you've wanted. After that, it's just getting every possible item to Rank 30, which isn't really the most fun thing in the world.

Fun game but it definitely gets stale after awhile. Hope this game delivers some much needed good updates at some point and starts targeting towards players that are at end game.

Длиннопост )
Первые часов 10 увлекательное мессилово гринир , корпуса , заражённых . Потом разочарование от того что любую пушку и варфрейма нужно ждать от 12 часов до 3 дней , а ускорять только за донат . Дальше ещё большее разочарование от осознания факта того что слоты под всё за донат . Испытываешь огромную радость от того факта , что донат можно поднять торгуя с другими игроками . Торгуешь , покупаешь слоты , покупаешь ускорение . Осознаёшь как же всего там много и как же всё это долго собирать . Забрасываешь игру на пол года . Но что то снова начинает тянуть тебя обратно в эти коридоры полные вражин и лута . Заходишь обратно и начинаешь разбираться . Собирать теперь ещё больше . Через несколько сотен часов понимаешь что варфрейм твой слабоват , а оружие почти не дамажит  . Идёшь фармить моды и полярить оружие . После 1000 часов у тебя уже всё собрано , варфреймы прополярены и готовы к бою , оружие прополярено и снабжено мр . Теперь ты сила которая проносится по локе оставляя после себя горы трупов и унося лут пачками с час+ миссий . И тут наступает самая большая проблема варфа . Кончился интересный контент , а тот что остался долгий и нудный (личи , стальной путь , рэйлджек ) . И в итоге ты заходишь раз в пару месяцев от скуки поляря оружки , переделывая билды и совсем от скуки помогая новичкам . Ночная волна конечно заставляет тебя играть какое то время , но только до 30-го ранга . Дальше только валюта для магазина ночной волны , которую иногда подфармливаешь ради какого то шлема или украшение в орбитр . Всё . Дальше самоё тяжёлое испытание . Ждать .
И ты честно ждёшь новый контент с удовольствием изучая новые механики , оружия , варфреймов и локации . А потом ...

Снова ждать ...
